Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பற்றுள்ளம் என்னும் இவறன்மை எற்றுள்ளும் எண்ணப் படுவதொன் றன்று.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Griping avarice is not to be reckoned as one among other faults; (it stands alone - greater than all).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: In the center, a monstrous, all-consuming vortex of darkness representing Avarice ('இவறன்மை'). It is uniquely powerful and terrifying.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Surrounding this central vortex, other faults are personified as lesser monsters or demons (e.g., Anger as a small fiery imp, Lust as a shadow). However, they are all dwarfed by, and seem to orbit, the central vortex of Avarice.
Layered_Composition.Background: A desolate landscape that has been completely drained of all color and life by the central vortex, showing its supreme destructive power.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The fault of possessive avarice is not just one among many; it is a singular, unparalleled fault that stands above all others in its destructive nature.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The central, giant vortex of Avarice, compared to the smaller, satellite-like monsters of other faults, visually establishes its supreme and singular status ('எண்ணப் படுவதொன்று அன்று').
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Overwhelming, singular, destructive, monstrous, supreme evil.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: An oppressive darkness dominates the scene, with a terrifying, light-absorbing quality to the central vortex. The lesser monsters may have small, colored glows, but they are pale in comparison.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A low-angle, ultra-wide shot looking up at the vortex, making it seem immense and all-powerful.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with complex special effects for the vortex.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The scene is lit by the faint, colored glows of the lesser faults, which are being consumed by the blackness of the central vortex.

Negative_Prompt: avarice as a small monster, bright landscape, text artifacts, cartoonish demons.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the appearance of the central vortex.
